name: Build Up (itch) (Zlitch)
description:
A245 a Criminal is given a death sentence by the court. but it seems that the court is not that cruel to kill anybody. so, they give the criminal a change to escape , only if they can!.  will the criminal escape from the one death room??!

Details : 

build up is a game made in 48 hours for the Indie tales game jam and my first game jam as well. I am Zlitch(of course not real name)  a indie game developer and a student.  hope you like it!.  

your goal in this game is to escape the death room . there is a machine that provides you blocks, by which you can build up to escape the room! 

Controls :    

A,D - to move  

Space - to jump

Left Click - to Place Block

Right Click - to Destory Block
